title: Info
description: Learn about Pecky, the community-driven token on Supra with zero team tokens. Discover how we burn Pecky through staking, NFT royalties, and PeckyBot.
ogDescription: Learn about Pecky, the community-driven token on Supra with zero team tokens.
introText:
Pecky was hatched from the ChickenWings NFT collection.
Pecky is a true community token with zero team tokens. Hold your Peckys tight, because we burn everything we can get our wings on!
burningRitualHeading: How does our burning ritual work?

staking.title: STAKING
staking.description:
Stake your $SUPRA on the Meridian node and get the same 8% node rewards as anywhere else,
but you also get the same amount of $Pecky as your daily staked $SUPRA!
Even better: 50% of the node rewards are used to buy up and burn $Pecky for the community!

nfts.title: NFTs
nfts.description:
All NFTs sold on the Crystara marketplace have a 5% royalty.
Instead of keeping these fees, we use every penny to buy and burn Pecky!

peckybot.title: PECKYBOT
peckybot.description:
On Discord, our bot helps NFT traders by sending instant alerts when:
â€¢ someone bids on your NFT
â€¢ a top collection NFT is listed below your set price
All Pecky used as gas for the bot is instantly sent to the burn pile!

questionsText: Have questions? Join our Discord or check us out on X!
